Package game.trader

Class MerchantKale

java.lang.Object
game.engine.actors.Actor
game.trader.MerchantKale
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, Purchase, SellItem, SellWeapon
public class MerchantKale
extends Actor
implements Purchase, SellWeapon, SellItem
Merchant Kale is a trader that can sell and purchase weapons Created by:
Author:
Ziheng Liao Modified by: Harshath Muruganantham
